amendment.description: To ensure convenient access to pharmacies and prohibit the tying of contracts

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1051 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 1051 proposed by Senator Enzi. (consideration: CR S8487-8489; text: CR S8487) To ensure convenient access to pharmacies and prohibit the tying of contracts
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1051 proposed by Senator Enzi.
